newsitem.title: USA: Amgen names Souza senior VP of research.
newsitem.headline: Amgen names Souza senior VP of research.

text.p: Amgen Inc Thursday named Lawrence Souza senior vice president of research.
Souza previously served as vice president, molecular and cellular biology. He succeeds Daniel Vapnek, who announced his retirement last June.

Souza has been with Amgen since 1981 and has served as director, exploratory programs and has been responsible for the discovery of new product candidates with a focus on molecular, developmental and experimental biology. He was instrumental in the discovery and cloning of NEUPOGEN (Filgrastim, G-CSF), one of Amgen's two breakthrough products.
